name: ar-builders-public
description: * Users visit different AR image markers around the office to see Builders in AR * When a user clicks a builder, the builder's dialogue appears * Users can also view builder "tools" in AR * Users can collect all the tools by viewing them * When a user visits a builder who has specified a preference for a particular tool (e.g. maybe Pyra wants a hammer), the user can "gift" the tool to the builder to unlock new dialogue
